column4: Hi, My kdm messed up :\. I installed ratpoison and fluxbox some days ago but it was until today that i logged in with fluxbox. I didn't like it so i logged out and chose KDE again. When i logged in, a white... black.. weird screen appeared only showing my mouse clearly. I removed fluxbox and ratpoison from a different tty and rebooted to see if that would help but my screen is still with those weird colors. I'm on irssi now!
Please help!
I'm using kubuntu, btw
You probably have to select KDE as the session from the kdm login
reselect
What happened when you reselected KDE as your x session at the KDM login screen?

the same... it's just a white screen that then turns black, and the only thing i can see clearly is my mouse pointer. Kde kind of tries to show the windows and menus though, when i try to like click then K a little white shadow is shown for a second
It's compositing
You have to restart kwin from a terminal while the white screen is up
killall kwin;kwin --replace
when i run "kwin --replace" it says "kwin: Cannot connect to X server." This worked tho, Now i can see my kde as it was before =D thanks!
